Faculty

Taejune Park (박태준)

Assistant Professor / Ph.D.

School of Artificial Intelligence, College of AI Convergence

Department of Software Engineering, College of Engineering

Chonnam National University


Office: Engineering Building #7, Room 422
Phone: +82-62-530-4232
E-mail: taejune.park [at] jnu.ac.kr
 Google scholar

Taejune Park is an Assistant Professor at the College of AI Convergence, School of Artificial Intelligence at Chonnam National University (JNU). He received the Ph.D. degree from Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST), advised by Prof. Seungwon Shin, the M.S degree from KAIST, and the B.S. from Korea Maritime and Ocean University (KMOU), all in Computer Science/Engineering. Prior to joining JNU in 2021, he has been a post-doctoral researcher fellow at KAIST, software developer at an internship program at Samsung Electronics Co., LTD., called Samsung Software Membership. His research interests include security issues on an SDN/NFV environment and IoT (Internet of Things), and a data plane architecture.
